home.title: Find Your Perfect
home.subtitle: Book unique homestays surrounded by mountains, rivers, and forests. Experience authentic Thai hospitality in nature.
home.featureMountainDesc: Wake up to misty peaks and fresh air
home.whyText: We connect travelers with authentic nature homestays run by local hosts across Thailand. Every property is hand-selected for its natural beauty, hospitality, and unique character. Book easily with PromptPay â€” or let our AI assistant help you find the perfect stay.
home.policyIntro: Your privacy matters to us. Here's how we handle your data:
home.policy1: We collect only the information needed to process your booking â€” name, email, phone number, and payment slip.
home.policy2: Your personal data is never sold or shared with third parties for marketing purposes.
home.policy3: Payment slips are verified securely and stored only for booking confirmation purposes.
home.policy4: You can request deletion of your data at any time by contacting us.
home.termsIntro: By using PeaksNature, you agree to the following terms:
home.terms1: Bookings are confirmed only after successful payment verification.
home.terms2: Cancellation policies vary by homestay. Please check with the host before booking.
home.terms3: PeaksNature acts as a platform connecting guests with hosts. We are not the accommodation provider.
home.terms4: Guests are responsible for providing accurate contact information for booking confirmations.
home.terms5: Hosts reserve the right to set their own pricing, availability, and house rules.
home.contactIntro: Have questions or need help? We'd love to hear from you.
home.contactHoursValue: Monday â€“ Sunday, 9:00 AM â€“ 9:00 PM (Bangkok Time)

dashboardGuide.title: Setup Guide
dashboardGuide.subtitle: Follow these steps to get your homestay ready for guests
dashboardGuide.step1Desc: Set up your contact and payment information so guests can reach you and pay securely.
dashboardGuide.step1Item2: PromptPay ID (required â€” used for guest payment QR)
dashboardGuide.step1Item3: Deposit amount (optional, default is full payment)
dashboardGuide.step1Item4: Notification preference: Push notification or LINE
dashboardGuide.step2Desc: Connect LINE Messaging API so you receive booking alerts via LINE. This requires a LINE Official Account.
dashboardGuide.step2Item1: Go to LINE Developers Console (developers.line.biz) and log in
dashboardGuide.step2Item2: Create a new Provider (or select existing), then create a Messaging API channel
dashboardGuide.step2Item3: In the channel settings, go to "Messaging API" tab and issue a Channel Access Token (long-lived)
dashboardGuide.step2Item4: Copy the Channel Access Token and paste it into the "LINE Channel Access Token" field in your Profile
dashboardGuide.step2Item5: Find your LINE User ID in the "Basic settings" tab of the channel (starts with U)
dashboardGuide.step2Item6: Copy the User ID and paste it into the "LINE User ID" field in your Profile, then save
dashboardGuide.step3Desc: Add your property details so guests know what to expect.
dashboardGuide.step3Item1: Name, slug (your booking page URL), tagline & description
dashboardGuide.step3Item4: Images: logo, hero banner, and gallery photos
dashboardGuide.step4Desc: Add an interactive map to your booking page so guests can find your homestay easily.
dashboardGuide.step4Item1: Open Google Maps (maps.google.com) and search for your homestay location
dashboardGuide.step4Item2: Click the "Share" button, then select the "Embed a map" tab
dashboardGuide.step4Item3: Copy the HTML code â€” it looks like: <iframe src="https://www.google.com/maps/embed?..."></iframe>
dashboardGuide.step4Item4: Paste only the URL from inside src="..." into the "Map Embed URL" field in your Homestay settings
dashboardGuide.step4Item5: The URL should start with https://www.google.com/maps/embed
dashboardGuide.step5Desc: Choose a brand color that reflects your homestay's style.
dashboardGuide.step5Item1: Pick from preset colors or enter a custom hex code
dashboardGuide.step5Item2: Preview how it looks on your booking page
dashboardGuide.step6Desc: Set up rooms with pricing and photos for guests to book.
dashboardGuide.step6Item1: Room name, description, price per night, max guests, quantity
dashboardGuide.step6Item3: Seasonal pricing (optional â€” set different prices for specific date ranges)
dashboardGuide.step7Desc: Block out dates before you go live to avoid unwanted bookings.
dashboardGuide.step7Item1: Block dates for maintenance or personal use
dashboardGuide.step7Item2: Block per-room or for the entire homestay
dashboardGuide.verifyItem1: Visit your booking page to see how it looks to guests
dashboardGuide.verifyItem2: Make a test booking to verify notifications arrive correctly
